letters.description: Facilitate client awareness of present moment bodily sensations and associated emotions.
Identify the links between physical sensations, emotional states, and past experiences.
Cultivate acceptance and compassion towards the body's responses and inherent wisdom.
Notice and explore natural movement impulses and urges without judgment or suppression.
Support the safe and gradual release of held tension and emotional charge through somatic techniques.
Allow the body and mind to integrate the experience, fostering resilience and embodied wholeness.
